title: Hazardous Waste Field Investigation Simulation: Integrated Theory and Practice Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Simulation software education via real-time video platforms, with a cloud-based environment accessible through learners' personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can execute hazardous waste field survey processes step-by-step using simulation software
Learners can explain systemic approaches to solve complex and open-ended problems (e.g., pollution source tracking, treatment plan development)
Learners can analyze the connection between theory and practical application and demonstrate it through project reports

resources: Digital Template for Knowledge Map Creation

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
